content: The Thunderbolt Horn is one of the Uncommon Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. It offers a rather specialized buff to your Gourd, compared to some of the flat-out damage negation buffs or health boosts some of the Soaks offer.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderbolt_Horn.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderbolt Horn'.
The content is as follows:
The Thunderbolt Horn is one of the Uncommon Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. It offers a rather specialized buff to your Gourd, compared to some of the flat-out damage negation buffs or health boosts some of the Soaks offer.
